code:
%% The Bug Life Cycle by emphonic.com
%% A "quick fix" journey through time

flowchart TD
    classDef pain fill:#fca5a5,stroke:#f66,stroke-width:2px
    classDef hope fill:#86efac,stroke:#22c55e,stroke-width:2px
    classDef reality fill:#fde047,stroke:#eab308,stroke-width:2px

    A[ğŸ› Bug Reported] --> B{Is it reproducible?}
    B -->|Works on my machine| C[Close ticket]:::hope
    B -->|Yes, somehow| D[Estimate: 2 hours]:::hope

    D --> E[Find the bug: 4 hours]:::reality
    E --> F[Fix the bug: 10 minutes]:::hope
    F --> G[Break 3 other things]:::pain

    G --> H[Blame the framework]
    H --> I[Realize it was your code]:::pain
    I --> J[Fix those 3 things]

    J --> K{Tests pass?}
    K -->|Locally yes| L[Push to prod]
    K -->|CI fails| M[Unrelated test broke]:::pain

    L --> N[Bug returns in prod]:::pain
    M --> O[Restart CI 5 times]
    O --> K

    N --> P[It's 6 PM on Friday]:::pain
    P --> A

    C --> Q[Bug reopened 3 months later]:::pain
    Q --> A
